verses.verse: These Things <S%G5023><s%> I Have Spoken <S%G2980><s%> To You <S%G5213><s%> <S%G2443><s%> That <S%G3361><s%> Ye May Not Be Offended. <S%G4624><s%>

Out Of The Synagogues <S%G656><s%> They Will Put <S%G4160><s%> You; <S%G5209><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> Is Coming <S%G2064><s%> An Hour <S%G5610><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Everyone <S%G3956><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Kills <S%G615><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> Will Think <S%G1380><s%> Service <S%G2999><s%> To Render <S%G4374><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To God; <S%G2316><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> These Things <S%G5023><s%> They Will Do <S%G4160><s%> To You <S%G5213><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3756><s%> They Know Not <S%G1097><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> Nor <S%G3761><s%> Me. <S%G1691><s%>

But <S%G235><s%> These Things <S%G5023><s%> I Have Said <S%G2980><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> When <S%G3752><s%> May Have Come <S%G2064><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Hour <S%G5610><s%> Ye May Remember <S%G3421><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> I 1473 P-1NS Said Them 2036 V-2AAI-1S To You. 5213 P-2DP 5023 D-APN But These Things 1161 CONJ To You 5213 P-2DP From The 1537 PREP Beginning 746 N-GSF 3756 PRT-N I Did Not Say 2036 V-2AAI-1S Because 3754 CONJ ' With 3326 PREP You 5216 P-2GP I Was. 2252 V-IXI-1S

' But <S%G235><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> These Things <S%G5023><s%> I Have Said <S%G2980><s%> To You <S%G5213><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Grief <S%G3077><s%> Has Filled <S%G4137><s%> Your <S%G5216><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Heart. <S%G2588><s%>

' But <S%G235><s%> I 1473 P-1NS The 3588 T-ASF Truth 225 N-ASF Say 3004 V-PAI-1S To You, 5213 P-2DP It Is Profitable 4851 V-PAI-3S For You 5213 P-2DP That 2443 CONJ I 1473 P-1NS Should Go Away; 565 V-2AAS-1S 1437 COND 1063 CONJ For If 3361 PRT-N I Go Not Away 565 V-2AAS-1S The 3588 T-NSM Paraclete 3875 N-NSM 3756 PRT-N Will Not Come 2064 V-FDI-3S To 4314 PREP You; 5209 P-2AP 1437 COND But If 1161 CONJ I Go, 4198 V-AOS-1S I Will Send 3992 V-FAI-1S Him 846 P-ASM To 4314 PREP You. 5209 P-2AP

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Come <S%G2064><s%> He <S%G1565><s%> Will Convict <S%G1651><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> World <S%G2889><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> Sin <S%G266><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> Righteousness <S%G1343><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> Judgment. <S%G2920><s%>
Concerning <S%G4012><s%> <S%G266><s%> Sin, <S%G3303><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3756><s%> They Believe Not <S%G4100><s%> On <S%G1519><s%> Me; <S%G1691><s%>

Concerning <S%G4012><s%> <S%G1343><s%> Righteousness <S%G1161><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3962><s%> My Father <S%G3450><s%> I Go Away, <S%G5217><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> No <S%G3756><s%> Longer <S%G2089><s%> Ye Behold <S%G2334><s%> Me; <S%G3165><s%>

<S%G4012><s%> And Concerning <S%G1161><s%> Judgment, <S%G2920><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ruler <S%G758><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2889><s%> Of This World <S%G5127><s%> Has Been Judged. <S%G2919><s%>

Yet <S%G2089><s%> Many Things <S%G4183><s%> I Have <S%G2192><s%> To Say <S%G3004><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Ye Are Not Able <S%G1410><s%> To Bear Them <S%G941><s%> Now. <S%G737><s%>

<S%G3752><s%> But When <S%G1161><s%> May Have Come <S%G2064><s%> He, <S%G1565><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Truth, <S%G225><s%> He Will Guide <S%G3594><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Truth; <S%G225><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> He Will Speak <S%G2980><s%> ' From <S%G575><s%> Himself, <S%G1438><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> <S%G3745><s%> Whatsoever <S%G302><s%> He May Hear <S%G191><s%> He Will Speak; <S%G2980><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The Things <S%G3588><s%> Coming <S%G2064><s%> He Will Announce <S%G312><s%> To You. <S%G5213><s%>

He <S%G1565><s%> Me <S%G1691><s%> Will Glorify, <S%G1392><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Mine <S%G1700><s%> , He Will Receive, <S%G2983><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Will Announce <S%G312><s%> To You. <S%G5213><s%>

All Things <S%G3956><s%> Whatsoever <S%G3745><s%> Has <S%G2192><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> Mine <S%G1699><s%> Are; <S%G2076><s%> Because Of <S%G1223><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> I Said, <S%G2036><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Mine <S%G1700><s%> , He Will Receive, <S%G2983><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Will Announce <S%G312><s%> To You. <S%G5213><s%>

A Little While <S%G3397><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Ye Do Not Behold <S%G2334><s%> Me; <S%G3165><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Again <S%G3825><s%> A Little While <S%G3397><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Ye Shall See <S%G3700><s%> Me, <S%G3165><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> I 1473 P-1NS Go Away 5217 V-PAI-1S To 4314 PREP The 3588 T-ASM Father. 3962 N-ASM

Said <S%G2036><s%> Therefore Some <S%G3767><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3101><s%> His Disciples <S%G846><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> One Another, <S%G240><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> He Says <S%G3004><s%> To Us, <S%G2254><s%> A Little While <S%G3397><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Ye Do Not Behold <S%G2334><s%> Me; <S%G3165><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Again <S%G3825><s%> A Little While <S%G3397><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Ye Shall See <S%G3700><s%> Me? <S%G3165><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> I 1473 P-1NS Go Away 5217 V-PAI-1S To 4314 PREP The 3588 T-ASM Father? 3962 N-ASM

They Said <S%G3004><s%> Therefore, <S%G3767><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> He Says, <S%G3004><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Little While? <S%G3397><s%> <S%G3756><s%> We Do Not Know <S%G1492><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> He Speaks. <S%G2980><s%>

Knew <S%G1097><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> They Desired <S%G2309><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> To Ask, <S%G2065><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> This <S%G5127><s%> Do Ye Inquire <S%G2212><s%> ' Among <S%G3326><s%> One Another, <S%G240><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> I Said, <S%G2036><s%> A Little While <S%G3397><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Ye Do Not Behold <S%G2334><s%> Me; <S%G3165><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Again <S%G3825><s%> A Little While <S%G3397><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Ye Shall See <S%G3700><s%> Me? <S%G3165><s%>

Verily <S%G281><s%> Verily <S%G281><s%> I Say <S%G3004><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Will Weep <S%G2799><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Will Lament <S%G2354><s%> Ye, <S%G5210><s%> <S%G3588><s%> But The <S%G1161><s%> World <S%G2889><s%> Will Rejoice; <S%G5463><s%> <S%G5210><s%> But Ye <S%G1161><s%> Will Be Grieved, <S%G3076><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3077><s%> Your Grief <S%G5216><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Joy <S%G5479><s%> Shall Become. <S%G1096><s%>

The <S%G3588><s%> Woman <S%G1135><s%> When <S%G3752><s%> She Gives Birth, <S%G5088><s%> Grief <S%G3077><s%> Has, <S%G2192><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> Is Come <S%G2064><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5610><s%> Her Hour; <S%G846><s%> <S%G3752><s%> But When <S%G1161><s%> She Brings Forth <S%G1080><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Child, <S%G3813><s%> No <S%G3756><s%> Longer <S%G2089><s%> She Remembers <S%G3421><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Tribulation, <S%G2347><s%> On Account Of <S%G1223><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Joy <S%G5479><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Has Been Born <S%G1080><s%> A Man <S%G444><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> World. <S%G2889><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Ye <S%G5210><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> Grief <S%G3077><s%> Indeed <S%G3303><s%> Now <S%G3568><s%> Have; <S%G2192><s%> <S%G3825><s%> But Again <S%G1161><s%> I Will See <S%G3700><s%> You, <S%G5209><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Shall Rejoice <S%G5463><s%> Your <S%G5216><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Heart, <S%G2588><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5479><s%> Your Joy <S%G5216><s%> No One <S%G3762><s%> Takes <S%G142><s%> ' From <S%G575><s%> You. <S%G5216><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> That <S%G1565><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Day <S%G2250><s%> Of Me <S%G1691><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Ye Shall Ask <S%G2065><s%> Nothing. <S%G3762><s%> Verily <S%G281><s%> Verily <S%G281><s%> I Say <S%G3004><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3745><s%> Whatsoever <S%G302><s%> Ye May Ask <S%G154><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3686><s%> My Name <S%G3450><s%> He Will Give <S%G1325><s%> You. <S%G5213><s%>

<S%G2193><s%> Hitherto <S%G737><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Ye Asked <S%G154><s%> Nothing <S%G3762><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3686><s%> My Name : <S%G3450><s%> Ask, <S%G154><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> , Ye Shall Receive, <S%G2983><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5479><s%> Your Joy <S%G5216><s%> May Be <S%G5600><s%> Full. <S%G4137><s%>

These Things <S%G5023><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Allegories <S%G3942><s%> I Have Spoken <S%G2980><s%> To You; <S%G5213><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> Is Coming <S%G2064><s%> An Hour <S%G5610><s%> When <S%G3753><s%> No <S%G3756><s%> Longer <S%G2089><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Allegories <S%G3942><s%> I Will Speak <S%G2980><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> But <S%G235><s%> Plainly <S%G3954><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> I Will Announce <S%G312><s%> To You. <S%G5213><s%>

In <S%G1722><s%> That <S%G1565><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Day <S%G2250><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3686><s%> My Name <S%G3450><s%> Ye Shall Ask; <S%G154><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> I Say <S%G3004><s%> To You <S%G5213><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> I 1473 P-1NS Will Beseech 2065 V-FAI-1S The 3588 T-ASM Father 3962 N-ASM For 4012 PREP You, 5216 P-2GP

Himself <S%G846><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> Loves <S%G5368><s%> You, <S%G5209><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> Ye <S%G5210><s%> Me <S%G1691><s%> Have Loved, <S%G5368><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Have Believed <S%G4100><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> I 1473 P-1NS From 3844 PREP 3588 T-GSM God 2316 N-GSM Came Out. 1831 V-2AAI-1S

I Came Out <S%G1831><s%> From <S%G3844><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Have Come <S%G2064><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> World; <S%G2889><s%> Again <S%G3825><s%> I Leave <S%G863><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> World <S%G2889><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Go <S%G4198><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Father. <S%G3962><s%>

Say <S%G3004><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3101><s%> His Disciples, <S%G846><s%> Lo, <S%G1492><s%> Now <S%G3568><s%> Plainly <S%G3954><s%> Thou Speakest, <S%G2980><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Allegory <S%G3942><s%> No <S%G3762><s%> Speakest. <S%G3004><s%>

Now <S%G3568><s%> We Know <S%G1492><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Thou Knowest <S%G1492><s%> All Things, <S%G3956><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Need <S%G5532><s%> Hast <S%G2192><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Anyone <S%G5100><s%> Thee <S%G4571><s%> Should Ask. <S%G2065><s%> By <S%G1722><s%> This <S%G5129><s%> We Believe <S%G4100><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> From <S%G575><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Thou Camest Forth. <S%G1831><s%>
Answered <S%G611><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> Now <S%G737><s%> Do Ye Believe? <S%G4100><s%>

Lo, <S%G2400><s%> Is Coming <S%G2064><s%> An Hour <S%G5610><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Now <S%G3568><s%> Has Come, <S%G2064><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Ye Will Be Scattered <S%G4650><s%> Each <S%G1538><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> His Own, <S%G2398><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Me <S%G1691><s%> Alone <S%G3441><s%> Ye Will Leave; <S%G863><s%> And Yet <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> I Am Not <S%G1510><s%> Alone, <S%G3441><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> ' With <S%G3326><s%> Me <S%G1700><s%> Is. <S%G2076><s%>
